ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Bazzar location?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Bazaar is in the Luclin expansion. From the Plan of Knowledge go to the Nexus gate. From the Nexus gate bring up the map and head to the Bazaar portal.  Is
ygData.messageBody:
The Bazaar is in the Luclin expansion.

From the Plan of Knowledge go to the Nexus gate.
From the Nexus gate bring up the map and head to the Bazaar portal. Is is
in the south branch of the nexus.

I picked up Everquest Evolution for $30 at my local software shop. It has
Everquest Classic, Ruins of Kunark, Scars of Velious, Shadows of Luclin,
Planes of Power and Legacy of Ykesha.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jstrackeicg [mailto:jstrackeicg@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 04, 2003 12:18 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Bazzar location?
>
>
> I know this may seem like a rather stupid question, but please humor
> me. I only have the PoP expansion, I play on the Mael.. Star..
> (something like that) server. Where is/How do you get to the Bazzar
> that I have heard so much about.
> Thank you in advance for your time.
>
